Articles.Content:
Exactly what the title says, remove curse, it's clunky, malware-laced and it sucks.

Also, we don't want alot of minecraft users flooding this forum, do we?

Hi, Sylandro.

Curse will remain our official mod repository and thus far we have received no issues pertaining to malware for users downloading from Kerbal Curseforge. Additionally, players of all types, levels, races, genders, lifeforms and communities are welcome here on this forum. For further info and opinions on Curse, please see this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79011-The-Curse-Thread. Thanks.
